plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you pick a profile picture for your account.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you take a profile picture for your account.

plugins.userTrackingPermission: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you. Also, for app and booking personalization.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Shuttlelane to use your location. This is solely for pickup address auto completion during bookings.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Shuttlelane to use your location. This is solely for pickup address auto completion during bookings.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Shuttlelane to use your location. This is solely for pickup address auto completion during bookings.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take user pictures. This is for their profile images and problem reports.
